## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G20910](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G20910)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>CRM2, HEN1</u>
- **Gene Name:** CORYMBOSA 2, HUA ENHANCER 1
- **Description:**   double-stranded RNA binding protein-related / DsRBD protein-like protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
